name: Magical Town
description:
Years ago, in a great war, the town's wizards created a magical shield with a powerful spell. This shield was used to protect the town from evil creatures. However, one day, the spell around the shield was broken and the town fell under the influence of magical creatures. Now, you have been tasked by the archwizard to form a team of friendly sorcerers and save the town. You will embark on a journey through the dangerous creature-filled town, complete challenging quests, and secure the town once again. You have been assigned by the archwizard to rescue the town besieged by magical creatures.

Features
  • Complete quests to unlock bonus runes and locked characters.
  • Kill creatures to earn gold and experience points.
  • Use gold to purchase new spells.
  • Acquire permanent extra bonuses for gold.
